lead_paragraph: Calling their hometown market economically stagnant and plans for a billion-dollar new stadium a recipe for financial disaster, the St. Louis Rams on Wednesday released a withering list of reasons they want to leave for Southern California that brought immediate condemnation from the governor and fans alike.

headline.print_headline: Rams Owner Kroenke Rips St. Louis Market as He Seeks LA Move
headline.main: Rams Owner Kroenke Rips St. Louis Market as He Seeks LA Move
